original_title: The Stranger: Breach of the Peace
overview: The Stranger (Colin Baker), still stranded on Earth, has escaped his pursuers and found a safe haven under an assumed name. But his former associates want him back and are not giving up the chase so easily, and his lost past is about to catch up with him...
tagline: The Stranger's past is catching up.
title: The Stranger: Breach of the Peace
